name: Oliver (LowRezJam 2021)
description:
In this Metroidvania-esque game, you play as oliver, a cat who has found himself somewhere underground.

Use the arrow keys to move

Z to jump

X to Shoot/Interact

Made for LowRez2021. I apologize for any bugs or issues that you come across

Thank to Kevin Thompson and flashjaysan to help me fix some issues with the enemy AI, Nerdy Teachers for their tutorials on platformer physics, Pixel's Cave Story and its Pico-8 Demake by the Doubtful Solution Brothers for inspirations.
